news_content: Enrollment for the upcoming Spring Semester will start on January 30, 2024, and will end on February 10, 2024. Please ensure to complete all necessary requirements.
The classes for the Spring Semester 2024 will commence on February 20, 2024. Make sure to attend the orientation sessions and be prepared for an exciting academic term.
The examination schedule for the Spring Semester 2024 has been released. Examinations will take place from April 10 to April 25, 2024. Ensure timely preparation and best of luck!
